\uc885\ub8cc \uc2dc \uc2e4\ud589\ub418\ub294 \ud568\uc218\ub85c\uc368 \uac8c\uc784 \uacb0\uacfc\ub97c \uc5c5\ub370\uc774\ud2b8 \ud55c \ud6c4 LOSE \uc774\ubca4\ud2b8\ub97c \ubc1c\uc0dd\uc2dc\ud0a8\ub2e4..\r","params":{"_gameHex":"\uae30\uc874 \uac8c\uc784 \ub85c\uadf8\uc640\uc758 \ube44\uad50\ub97c \ud1b5\ud574 \uc870\uc791 \uc5ec\ubd80\ub97c \ud655\uc778\ud55c\ub2e4.\r","_isWinner":"\uac8c\uc784 \uc2b9\ub9ac \uc5ec\ubd80\ub97c \ud655\uc778\ud558\uae30 \uc704\ud55c bool parameter\r"}},"exchangeTokens(uint256)":{"details":"MagnetField \ud1a0\ud070\uc744 Magnet \ud1a0\ud070\uc73c\ub85c \uad50\ud658\uc2dc\ucf1c\uc8fc\ub3c4\ub85d \uc694\uccad\ud55c\ub2e4.\r","params":{"_amount":"\uad50\ud658\ud558\uace0\uc790 \ud558\ub294 Magnet \ud1a0\ud070 \ub7c9\r"},"return":"\uc815\uc0c1\uc801\uc73c\ub85c transaction\uc774 \uc774\ub8e8\uc5b4\uc9c4 \uacbd\uc6b0 true\ub97c \ubc18\ud658\ud55c\ub2e4.\r"},"getGameResults(uint256)":{"details":"\uc720\uc800\uc758 \ud2b9\uc815(index) \uac8c\uc784 \uacb0\uacfc\ub97c \ubcf4\uc5ec\uc900\ub2e4.\r     Solidity \ud2b9\uc131 \uc0c1 mapping\uc744 \uc804\uccb4 \uc21c\ud68c\ud560 \uc218 \uc5c6\uae30\ub54c\ubb38\uc5d0 index\ub97c \ud65c\uc6a9\ud55c\ub2e4.\r     for loop\ub294 front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ub3cc\uba74\uc11c \ud655\uc778\ud560 \uc218 \uc788\ub3c4\ub85d \ud55c\ub2e4.\r     getTotalGameCount()\ub97c \uc774\uc6a9\ud574 front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ucd5c\uadfc \uac8c\uc784\ubc88\ud638\ub97c \uc800\uc7a5\ud55c\ub4a4 \uc774\ub97c \ud65c\uc6a9\ud574 for loop\ub97c \ub3c8\ub2e4\uba74\r     \ud655\uc778\uc774 \uac00\ub2a5\ud558\ub2e4.\r","params":{"index":"\uc54c\uace0\uc2f6\uc740 \uac8c\uc784\ubc88\ud638\r"},"return":"\ucd5c\uadfc \uac8c\uc784\uc758 \ub09c\uc774\ub3c4\uc640\ub97c \ubc18\ud658\ud55c\ub2e4.\r"},"getTotalGameCount()":{"details":"\ud2b9\uc815 \uc720\uc800\uc758 \ucd1d \uac8c\uc784 \ud69f\uc218\ub97c \ubc18\ud658\ud55c\ub2e4.\r","return":"\ud2b9\uc815 \uc720\uc800\uc758 \ucd1d \uac8c\uc784 \ud69f\uc218.\r"},"showETH()":{"details":"\ud604\uc7ac \ucee8\ud2b8\ub799\ud2b8 \uc0c1\uc758 ETH \ub7c9\uc744 \ubcf4\uc5ec\uc900\ub2e4.\r"},"startGame(bytes2,uint8,bytes32,bool[3])":{"details":"\uac8c\uc784 \uc2dc\uc791 \uc2dc \uc2e4\ud589\ub418\ub294 \ud568\uc218\ub85c\uc368 \uc720\uc800\uc815\ubcf4 \ucd5c\uc2e0\ud654 \ubc0f \uac8c\uc784\ub85c\uadf8 \uae30\ub85d\uc744 \ud55c \ud6c4 START \uc774\ubca4\ud2b8\ub97c \ubc1c\uc0dd\uc2dc\ud0a8\ub2e4.\r","params":{"_difficulty":"\uac8c\uc784\uc758 \ub09c\uc774\ub3c4\ub97c front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ubc1b\uc544\uc628\ub2e4.\r","_gameCost":"\uac8c\uc784 \uc2dc\uc791\uc5d0 \uc0ac\uc6a9\ud55c Magnet \ud1a0\ud070 \uc591\uc744 front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ubc1b\uc544\uc628\ub2e4.\r","_gameHex":"\uac8c\uc784\uc758 transparency\ub97c \uc704\ud55c sha256 value\ub97c front-end\uc5d0\uc11c \ubc1b\uc544\uc628\ub2e4.\r"}},"useItems(bool[3])":{"details":"\uac8c\uc784 \uc2dc\uc791 \uc804 \uc544\uc774\ud15c \uc0ac\uc6a9 \uc5ec\ubd80\uc5d0 \ub530\ub77c MagnetField \ud1a0\ud070\uc744 \uac10\uc18c\uc2dc\ud0a8\ub2e4.\r","params":{"_useItems":"\uac01 \uc544\uc774\ud15c\uc5d0 \ub300\ud55c \uc120\ud0dd \uc5ec\ubd80 \uc815\ubcf4\ub97c \uac00\uc9c4 parameter\r"},"return":"\uc815\uc0c1\uc801\uc73c\ub85c \uc218\ud589\ub41c \uacbd\uc6b0 true\uac12\uc744 \ubc18\ud658\ud55c\ub2e4.\r"},"withdrawETHALL()":{"details":"deployer\uc5d0\uac8c \ucee8\ud2b8\ub799\ud2b8\uac00 \ubcf4\uc720\ud55c \uc804\uccb4 ETH\ub97c \uc9c0\uae09\ud55c\ub2e4.\r"}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/C/Users/kwonHyunwoo/Documents/GitHub/MineSweeperDApp/contracts/GameController.sol":"GameController"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/C/Users/kwonHyunwoo/Documents/GitHub/MineSweeperDApp/contracts/GameController.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf136496e13efcf5bd2b46643b815bed555b36df69725fa31e5f6729cff05496d","urls":["bzzr://655fb4c16d344f484dcd6d048a9b792a620d00282e6eb032c87d32bd429f844e"]},"/C/Users/kwonHyunwoo/Documents/GitHub/MineSweeperDApp/contracts/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb7a12e3be242ee84ec1f3d75043d2aee6775ead8f9def89e67501e89b8d5142e","urls":["bzzr://2e5f751a3c406051ad9d63d9c0c5609c6d7b1fe948abb5a8f7f54e05bfc7ce01"]},"/C/Users/kwonHyunwoo/Documents/GitHub/MineSweeperDApp/contracts/IMagnet.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3e27211014eefbb5304f8a0db50436a32267e27cf942b2369ac45befef202857","urls":["bzzr://1c47533f22cd51129e7e2b218975f4713cf8ba8924b050a5a6fd64057c765a30"]},"/C/Users/kwonHyunwoo/Documents/GitHub/MineSweeperDApp/contracts/IMagnetField.sol":{"keccak256":"0x94298120fe3509efff7dadbd587fc9710b075be52e89f343cd27ad6822739883","urls":["bzzr://28156c9e0310491d95d241dd678900954233ef3348b8a391ecf836cf6398a8bc"]},"/C/Users/kwonHyunwoo/Documents/GitHub/MineSweeperDApp/contracts/Magnet.sol":{"keccak256":"0x36902f1d7329fbe873f7d721eafe87a8f4fc30a89ca82426df24d3f4402d57a9","urls":["bzzr://2cdd276e663f5dfbf80e126fbf18d75917d72a84cf313e25d38b7da19149c609"]},"/C/Users/kwonHyunwoo/Documents/GitHub/MineSweeperDApp/contracts/MagnetField.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8a129b1c6f2753c16cb22fbb6b64e0d645e40d85b24204586d0e32b0770d99dc","urls":["bzzr://f6a7dc7ec97ff6eba0bc1efbf28db1830029666eb4710b12f2c9d92672a3535a"]},"/C/Users/kwonHyunwoo/Documents/GitHub/MineSweeperDApp/contracts/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9194acaa467da3228cea42c3168b23fae17941800328032108e3153d1a0fbb5f","urls":["bzzr://f9ed5b3ee80bc2b256d4855cc637a522e6dc61b2e endGame(bytes32,bool,address).details: 게임 종료 시 실행되는 함수로써 게임 결과를 업데이트 한 후 LOSE 이벤트를 발생시킨다..

params._gameHex: 기존 게임 로그와의 비교를 통해 조작 여부를 확인한다.
params._isWinner: 게임 승리 여부를 확인하기 위한 bool parameter

exchangeTokens(uint256).details: MagnetField 토큰을 Magnet 토큰으로 교환시켜주도록 요청한다.
exchangeTokens(uint256).return: 정상적으로 transaction이 이루어진 경우 true를 반환한다.

getGameResults(uint256).details: 유저의 특정(index) 게임 결과를 보여준다.     Solidity 특성 상 mapping을 전체 순회할 수 없기때문에 index를 활용한다.     for loop는 front-end에서 돌면서 확인할 수 있도록 한다.     getTotalGameCount()를 이용해 front-end에서 최근 게임번호를 저장한뒤 이를 활용해 for loop를 돈다면     확인이 가능하다.

getTotalGameCount().details: 특정 유저의 총 게임 횟수를 반환한다.

showETH().details: 현재 컨트랙트 상의 ETH 량을 보여준다.

startGame(bytes2,uint8,bytes32,bool[3]).details: 게임 시작 시 실행되는 함수로써 유저정보 최신화 및 게임로그 기록을 한 후 START 이벤트를 발생시킨다.

params._gameCost: 게임 시작에 사용한 Magnet 토큰 양을 front-end에서 받아온다.
params._gameHex: 게임의 transparency를 위한 sha256 value를 front-end에서 받아온다.

useItems(bool[3]).details: 게임 시작 전 아이템 사용 여부에 따라 MagnetField 토큰을 감소시킨다.

params._useItems: 각 아이템에 대한 선택 여부 정보를 가진 parameter

withdrawETHALL().details: deployer에게 컨트랙트가 보유한 전체 ETH를 지급한다.
